subject: Hello Sir,
body:
Hello Sir,
 My name is Meeder , I am Lebanese ,but presently here in Hong Kong my late father was a businessman in Hong Kong before he Died. He deposited $7million in a bitcoin wallet for me as my inheritance. The company invited me here regarding the funds deposited in my name, but I was told that they will not be able to release the funds to me because  I'm too young to handle such money. so I was told by Mr Peter Smith, CEO of the Company, to look for a beneficiary who will help me receive the funds.
 Sir, I sent you the deposit receipt in my name as next of kin, Please im waiting for recepose to help me and you will not spend money on the process to receive my funds but you will sign a contract agreement after you receive my funds. You will help me.
 
Best Regards,
Meeder

subject: Re:     Hello Sir,
body:
Hello Meeder,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm sorry to hear about your situation. It must be tough being in such a predicament at a young age. 

I'm curious, how did you come across my contact information? Also, could you please provide more details about this process? What exactly would my role be in helping you receive these funds?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Alan
